osgART::GenericVideoObject

osgART::GenericVideoObject Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for osgART::GenericVideoObject:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

It implements the very basic video functionality been used in osgART.

enum  TextureMode {
  USE_TEXTURE_DEFAULT = 0,

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum osgART::GenericVideoObject::DistortionCorrectionMode
 

Enumerator:
NO_CORRECTION  No correction is applied to the Texture.
CAMERA_PARAM_CORRECTION  The texture is being corrected from camera parameters.

enum osgART::GenericVideoObject::TextureMode
 

Enumerator:
USE_TEXTURE_DEFAULT  Default texture mode.
USE_TEXTURE_2D  Video is being pasted into a 2D texture.
USE_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE  Video is being attached to a 2D rectangle.
